update.description:
Some of them:

* Do not use std::toupper
* Use LoadLib instead of LoadLibrary to make Windows happy

    * See [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21)
    
* Add aliases for popen/pclose
* Missing libraries to link
* Do not use PrintWindowsSystemWarning since it is not expored in common

The whole family of fixes is being tested here:

* [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_gui-pr-win/12/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/12/console)

~~There are still some linking failures that are probably trivial under the somebody else eyes but gave some headaches on Friday:~~  Yes, they were trivial: [244b0d5](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/commits/244b0d5e17bc0d74e34e730c53039693919ba034)
update.title: Fix for ign-gui1 windows compilation

content.html: just made a new ign-rendering prelease. Restarted build

content.html: build failed.. looks like it needs a new ign-rendering prerelease..

update.description:
Some of them:

* Do not use std::toupper
* Use LoadLib instead of LoadLibrary to make Windows happy

    * See [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21)

* Do not use PrintWindowsSystemWarning since it is not expored in common

The whole family of fixes is being tested here:

* [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_gui-pr-win/12/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/12/console)

~~There are still some linking failures that are probably trivial under the somebody else eyes but gave some headaches on Friday:~~  Yes, they were trivial: [244b0d5](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/commits/244b0d5e17bc0d74e34e730c53039693919ba034)
update.title: Fix for ign-gui1 windows compilation

content.raw: If I understand it correctly, the problem is that MSVC is not shipping [toupper](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/c-runtime-library/reference/toupper-toupper-towupper-toupper-l-towupper-l?view=vs-2017) as part of the standard library so it is not recognized. The usual workaround is to use the plan C version of it which is recognized by all platforms.
content.html: If I understand it correctly, the problem is that MSVC is not shipping toupper as part of the standard library so it is not recognized. The usual workaround is to use the plan C version of it which is recognized by all platforms.

content.raw: Do you know why we shouldn't use `std::toupper`?
content.html: Do you know why we shouldn't use std::toupper?

content.raw:
Umm so the moc visibility is not that trivial. If we don't set visibility using `IGNITION_GUI_VISIBLE`the tests are failing due to not finding the necessary symbols. If we add visiblity the fail with:

    moc_worldstats.cpp(222): error C2491: 'ignition::gui::plugins::WorldStats::staticMetaObject': definition of dllimport static data member not allowed [D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_gui-pr-win\ws\build\ignition-gui1\include\ignition\gui\plugins\WorldStats.vcxproj]

Tested here: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_gui-pr-win/13/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/13/console)
content.html:
Umm so the moc visibility is not that trivial. If we don't set visibility using IGNITION_GUI_VISIBLEthe tests are failing due to not finding the necessary symbols. If we add visiblity the fail with:

moc_worldstats.cpp(222): error C2491: 'ignition::gui::plugins::WorldStats::staticMetaObject': definition of dllimport static data member not allowed [D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_gui-pr-win\ws\build\ignition-gui1\include\ignition\gui\plugins\WorldStats.vcxproj]

Tested here: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/13/console

update.description:
Some of them:

* Do not use std::toupper
* Use LoadLib instead of LoadLibrary to make Windows happy

    * See [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21)
    
* Add aliases for popen/pclose
* Missing libraries to link
* Do not use PrintWindowsSystemWarning since it is not expored in common

The whole family of fixes is being tested here:

* [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_gui-pr-win/12/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/12/console)

There are still some linking failures that are probably trivial under the somebody else eyes but gave some headaches on Friday:

    UNIT_SearchModel_TEST.vcxproj" 
      SearchModel_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: void __cdecl ignition::gui::SearchModel::SetSearch(class QString const &)" (?SetSearch@SearchModel@gui@ignition@@QEAAXAEBVQString@@@Z)
      SearchModel_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: virtual bool __cdecl ignition::gui::SearchModel::filterAcceptsRow(int,class QModelIndex const &)const " (?filterAcceptsRow@SearchModel@gui@ignition@@UEBA_NHAEBVQModelIndex@@@Z) 
    
    
    UNIT_WorldControl_TEST.vcxproj" (default target) (27) ->
      WorldControl_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: static struct QMetaObject const ignition::gui::plugins::WorldControl::staticMetaObject" (?staticMetaObject@WorldControl@plugins@gui@ignition@@2UQMetaObject@@B)
      WorldControl_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: void __cdecl ignition::gui::plugins::WorldControl::OnStep(void)" (?OnStep@WorldControl@plugins@gui@ignition@@QEAAXXZ) 
      WorldControl_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: void __cdecl ignition::gui::plugins::WorldControl::OnPause(void)" (?OnPause@WorldControl@plugins@gui@ignition@@QEAAXXZ)
      WorldControl_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: void __cdecl ignition::gui::plugins::WorldControl::OnPlay(void)" (?OnPlay@WorldControl@plugins@gui@ignition@@QEAAXXZ)
    
    UNIT_WorldStats_TEST.vcxproj" (default target) (32) ->
      WorldStats_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: class QString __cdecl ignition::gui::plugins::WorldStats::RealTime(void)const " (?RealTime@WorldStats@plugins@gui@ignition@@QEBA?AVQString@@XZ)
      WorldStats_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: class QString __cdecl ignition::gui::plugins::WorldStats::SimTime(void)const " (?SimTime@WorldStats@plugins@gui@ignition@@QEBA?AVQString@@XZ)
      WorldStats_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: class QString __cdecl ignition::gui::plugins::WorldStats::RealTimeFactor(void)const " (?RealTimeFactor@WorldStats@plugins@gui@ignition@@QEBA?AVQString@@XZ)
      WorldStats_TEST.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: static struct QMetaObject const ignition::gui::plugins::WorldStats::staticMetaObject" (?staticMetaObject@WorldStats@plugins@gui@ignition@@2UQMetaObject@@B)
